column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: Authorities visited an address on Street 132
column7: Phnom Penh on the evening of April 24
column8: 2020. .------The Ministry of Interior’s anti-counterfeit products team cracked down on the sale of cigarette smoking machines (vapes)
column9: MR circuits and other electronic devices. ------The owner
column11: lives at the above location.------This place appears to not have correct licenses or branding for the products. During the inspection of the site
column12: 59 vape machines and 632 bottles of e-liquid were taken to the Ministry of Interior.------The owner was not detained
column13: but invited to comment at the Ministry of Interior and temporarily suspend the vape business. ------AREY
